page.title: 09Local Memories continued
page.content: Mrs Townley also remembers when the Meadows pub had a bowling green.The people who built it said it could not be used for 2 years but the people of Maghull insisted.Hitler finished it off by dropping a bomb on it during the war and now it is used as a car park. When local farmers were ready to lift their potatoes they did not have enough pickers as so many men had gone off to war.To solve the problem the farmers came to the school and asked for childrento help.Mrs Townley went on the train to Altcar to do this.
